Posts.Content: On Apr 17, 2012 4:34 AM coachmare wrote: I switched from Arimindex to Tamoxifen because the side effects where horrible. I am almost 65, 63 when diagnosed.Hi, how long have you been on the tamoxifen & how are you doing now? Wish there were just a miracle pill!
Posts.Title: Arimidex versus Tamoxifen??

Posts.Content: My mom's breast cancer has spread , a scan yesterday detected a lung tumor as well. The breast tumor has hardened, oncologist is changing treatment from Arimidex to tamoxafin. She is 82 , not in very good health (obviously) , & doesn't tolerate surgery well. Anybody out there have any similar experiences or opinions about these meds/treatment? Thanks.
Posts.Title: Arimidex not working
